english.segment1: Here I am in that old place again. Down on my face again. Crying out I want you to hear my plea. Come down and rescue me
english.segment2: How long will it take. How long will I have to wait?
english.segment3: And all I want is all you have. Come to me, rescue me, Fall on me with your love. And all you want is all I have. Come to me, rescue me, fall on me with your love
english.segment4: Sanctify I want to be set apart. Right to the very heart. Prophesy to the four winds. And breathe life to this very place
english.segment5: How long will it take?. How long will I have to wait?
english.segment6: And all I want is all you have. Come to me rescue me, Fall on me with your love. And all you want is all I have. Come to me rescue me, Fall on me with your love
english.segment7: Lifted up I've climbed with the strength I have. Right to this mountain top. Looking out.. The cloud's getting bigger now.. It's time.. to get ready now
